project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. Contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and users will interact with the application through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the feature to add contacts
Implement the feature to search for contacts
Implement the feature to update existing contacts
Implement the feature to delete contacts
Implement JSON file handling to store contacts
Implement the user interface for terminal interaction
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
